summary: This is an email chain from August 15, 2019, forwarding internal Bureau of Prisons watch and observation logs for inmate Jeffrey Epstein (register number 76318-054). It details periods of staff watch and psychology observation for Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York in July 2019, just weeks before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate subject of the watch and psychology observation logs, identified by register number 76318-054.

persons.name: H01-001L
persons.context: A forensic psychologist (with Psy.D., Ph.D. credentials) and LCDR in the U.S. Public Health Service who conducted or oversaw psychology observations of Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

connections.description: Forensic psychologist H01-001L conducted psychology observations on inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Epstein placed on staff watch
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was placed on a staff watch starting at 1:40 am. An inmate companion took over the watch at 7:00 am.

events.title: Epstein changed to psychology observation
events.description: Epstein's status was changed to psychology observation at 8:45 am.

events.title: Psychology observation ended
events.description: The psychology observation for Epstein ended at 8:15 am.

events.title: Earlier psychology observation began
events.description: An earlier period of psychology observation for Epstein began at 6:00 pm.

events.title: Earlier psychology observation ended
events.description: The earlier psychology observation for Epstein ended at 9:00 am.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (register number 76318-054) was under staff watch and psychology observation at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in July 2019.
A forensic psychologist identified as H01-001L, an LCDR in the U.S. Public Health Service, was involved in the psychology observations.
Epstein was placed on a staff watch starting in the early morning of July 23, 2019, and changed to psychology observation on July 24.
This document is dated August 15, 2019, and is marked CONFIDENTIAL, indicating internal Bureau of Prisons communication.
The logs show two distinct periods of psychology observation for Epstein in July 2019, weeks before his death in August.
